Naruto concentrates [[Kurama]]'s [[Nine-Tails Chakra Mode|chakra]] into his arm, greatly enhancing his punching capabilities. With it, Naruto is also able to remove Toneri's [[Puppet-Cursing Sphere]] from others, freeing them from his control.

== Trivia ==
* While unnamed in the movie and anime, this technique was named in ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4]]''.
